subject: From Olivia Grace
body:
From Olivia Grace
My name is Mrs. Olivia Grace, I am a dying woman who has decided to donate what I have to the Charities. I am 75 years old and was diagnosed for cancer about four years ago, immediately after the death of my husband .I have been touched to donate
 
from what I have inherited from my late husband for the good work rather than allow his relatives to lavish my husband's hard earned fund. As I lay on my sick bed, I want you to help me in carrying out my last wish on earth which will also be very profitable to you. I want to WILL a total sum of $5.5 million USD to you which I want you to
 
distribute part of it to any charity home for me and the rest for yourself and your family, I will inform you on how to share all
Please kindly click the reply and get back to me.  
 
Best regards,
Mrs. Olivia Grace.

subject: Re:  From Olivia Grace
body:
Hello Mrs. Olivia Grace,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing your story with me. It's very kind of you to consider donating to charities and wanting to help others in need. I would be interested in learning more about how I can assist you in carrying out your last wish on earth. Could you please provide me with more details on how we can proceed with this donation distribution?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Fern

subject: Re: From Olivia Grace
body:
My Dearest in the lord,

Thank you so much for your concern. I also thank you for your urgent reply,
you're such a nice person I really need in this project. Like I mentioned,
the amount involved I want us to use part of it for charity and the other
you can invest it in lucrative business for the benefit of the charity and
also for yourself.

I found most African charity foundations for less privileges are owned and
established to enrich the owners, hundreds of millions are donated to these
homes but still the children in those homes are not well taken care of. The
rich now make deals with them to escape taxes by making false donations.
This is the main reason why my late husband and I want to establish a
charity foundation of our own and to make sure that the money is used for
the purpose it was meant for.

I was brought up in a motherless baby's home. My late husband and I were
married for thirty five years without a child. You might also be wondering
why I canâ€™t delegate this task to any of my husband's relatives. My
families and friends have plundered so much of my wealth since my illness
and I cannot live with the agony of entrusting this huge responsibility to
any of them anymore. I cannot also let this wealth be without stating any
beneficiary, that will make it go back to already corrupt rich governments
with millions of less privileged children in the society praying everyday
to be touched by someone to remember them.

My dear, please try to understand my situation and carry out this project
with me immediately. The decision making on how to use the fund will be
totally yours, you can build a school or safe house in your own country for
the less privileged around you. You can develop our already registered
charity foundation name here in South Africa if you choose to do it in
Africa.

There are no strings attached to this proposal. I am just a sick dying
woman who wishes to make a positive impact on humanity through your
assistance. You are welcome to fly down to South Africa to witness the
transfer processes  and also to meet me. However, if you are not able to
come down to South Africa at this time because of the COVID-19 Disease we
can as well carry on with the fund transfer by bank wire transfer to any of
your private or company bank accounts in your country.

Please let me know your readiness to proceed with the transfer either by
coming down to South Africa or do you want wire transfer.

Warm Regards,
Olivia Grace

subject: Re: From Olivia Grace
body:
Hello Olivia Grace,

Thank you for sharing your story and the details of your project. It's truly heartwarming to see your dedication to helping those in need through charity work. I appreciate you considering me for such an important endeavor.

I would like to learn more about the specifics of the project and how I can contribute to making a positive impact. Could you provide more information on how the fund transfer process works and what steps are involved in setting up the charity foundation?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Fern

subject: Re: From Olivia Grace
body:
Hello Olivia Grace,

Thank you for sharing your story and the details of your project. It's truly heartwarming to see your dedication to helping those in need through charity work. I appreciate you considering me for this opportunity.

I would like to know more about the charity foundation you and your late husband wanted to establish. Could you provide some additional information on how you envision it making a positive impact on society?

Also, regarding the fund transfer, could you please share more details about the process and how we can ensure transparency throughout?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Fern

subject: Re: From Olivia Grace
body:
Hello Olivia Grace,

Thank you for sharing your story and the details of your project. It's truly heartwarming to see your dedication to helping those in need through establishing a charity foundation. I appreciate you considering me for this opportunity.

I would like to know more about the specifics of the project and how I can contribute to making a positive impact. Could you provide more information on how the fund transfer process works and what steps are involved in ensuring that the money is used effectively for charity purposes?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Fern

subject: Re: From Olivia Grace
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's truly heartwarming to see your dedication to helping those in need through your charity foundation project. I appreciate your trust in involving me in this endeavor.

Could you please provide more details about the charity foundation you and your late husband intended to establish? I'm interested in learning how the funds will be utilized to make a positive impact on the less privileged.

Also, I would like to know more about the transfer process. How do we ensure that the funds are securely transferred for the intended purpose?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Fern

subject: Re: From Olivia Grace
body:
Hello Olivia Grace,

Thank you for sharing your story and the details of your project. It's truly heartwarming to see your dedication to helping those in need through charity work. I appreciate you considering me for such an important endeavor.

I would like to learn more about the charity foundation you and your late husband wish to establish. Could you provide me with some additional information on how you envision the funds being used to benefit the less privileged? 

Also, I'm curious about the process of setting up a charity foundation in South Africa. What are the legal requirements and steps involved in getting it registered?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Fern

subject: Re: From Olivia Grace
body:
Hello Olivia Grace,

Thank you for sharing your story and the details of your project. It's truly heartwarming to see your dedication to helping those in need through charity work. I appreciate you considering me for this opportunity.

I would like to know more about the charity foundation you and your late husband wanted to establish. Could you provide some information on the specific goals and objectives of the foundation? Additionally, how do you envision the funds being utilized to make a positive impact on humanity?

Regarding the transfer process, could you please share more details about how it will be carried out securely? I want to ensure that everything is done in a transparent and legitimate manner.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Fern

subject: Re: From Olivia Grace
body:
Hello Olivia Grace,

Thank you for sharing your story and the opportunity to be a part of your charitable project. It's truly inspiring to see your dedication to making a positive impact on humanity. I appreciate your trust in me to carry out this important task.

I would like to learn more about the details of the project and how we can proceed with the fund transfer. Could you provide more information about the charity foundation you wish to establish and how I can contribute to its success?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Fern
